title: 24g06  “Trolley or motorbus”.
text:
The term “trolley or motorbus” refers to
the type of buses operated by electrical power derived from fixed overhead
wires as well as to the ordinary gasoline or diesel power motorbus used in
furnishing local passenger transportation similar to street railway service.
html: The term “trolley or motorbus” refers to the type of buses operated by electrical power derived from fixed overhead wires as well as to the ordinary gasoline or diesel power motorbus used in furnishing local passenger transportation similar to street railway service.
